9. **Variations in Attribute Value Representation**: The attribute value "by" might be case-sensitive, have leading/trailing whitespace, or be part of a longer string within the attribute value.

10. **Encoding**: The encoding of the XML file might affect how text is read and interpreted.

Once you provide the XML file, I'll be able to use context clues and structured parsing techniques to overcome these challenges and identify the correct tag.
